Question 2

```{r}

y <- airquality[['Ozone']]
Air <- airquality[['Temp']]
ozone <- c()

for (i in 1:length(y)){
  if (!is.na(y[i])){
    ozone <- c(ozone,y[i])  
  }
}

mean(Air)
sd(Air)
min(Air)
max(Air)

mean(ozone)
sd(ozone)
min(ozone)
max(ozone)
```
